text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Satellaview, or BS-X, was released in 1995 in Japan to download exclusive satellite games on the St.GIGA network. It was sold as an additional peripheral device for the Super Famicom and was plugged in to the modem port. This early broadcast service is alleged to have gathered 100,000 monthly users before eventually shutting down. There were many unique games not available on any other systems of the time.
